2152.subject: ED
2152.descrlong: Provides participants with the required competencies to assist with teaching of exceptional students and information needed to meet federal and state mandates for serving children and youth with disabilities in schools. Includes exploration of educational laws, Individual Education Programs (IEPs), service delivery systems, modification of instructional methods, and assessment processes to support inclusion and mainstreaming of students with exceptionality in regular education environments. Fulfills state requirement for clear credential. (Offered as interest warrants.)
